DIRECT_GET_STARTED.TITLE: Get Started
DIRECT_GET_STARTED.SUBTITLE: Just a few simple questions to get you started.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Premium Waiver Rider
TOOLTIP.MESSAGE: In the event that you are diagnosed with Critical Illness, your remaining premiums will be waived without affecting the payout benefit to you.

FULL_OR_PARTIAL_RIDER.TITLE: Full/Partial Rider
FULL_OR_PARTIAL_RIDER.MESSAGE:
Full Rider: This rider provides coverage for both co-insurance and deductible components.

Partial Rider: This rider only provides coverage for either co-insurance or deductible.

FIXED_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Payout Feature
FIXED_TOOLTIP.MESSAGE:
Fixed payouts: These monthly payouts are guaranteed amounts that you will receive.

Variable payouts: These monthly payouts consist of a guaranteed amount that you will receive and a non-guaranteed amount that is dependent on the performance of the insurer’s participating fund.

Increasing payout: These monthly payouts can increase yearly.

VARIABLE_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Variable payouts
VARIABLE_TOOLTIP.MESSAGE: These monthly payouts consists of a guaranteed amount that you will receive and non-guaranteed amount that is dependent on the performance of the insurer’s participative fund.

INCREASING_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Increasing payout
INCREASING_TOOLTIP.MESSAGE: These monthly payouts can increase yearly.

NEED_UNDERWRITING_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Requires Underwriting
NEED_UNDERWRITING_TOOLTIP.DESCRIPTION: Before you can be insured under this plan, the insurer will first evaluate you.

CASH_VALUE_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Cash Value
CASH_VALUE_TOOLTIP.DESCRIPTION: When this plan matures, you will receive a cash payout!

ERROR_MODEL_FOR_MOBILE.TITLE: Compare 2 Only
ERROR_MODEL_FOR_MOBILE.MESSAGE: You can only compare a maximum of 2 plans at a time.

ERROR_MODEL_FOR_WEB.TITLE: Compare 4 Only
ERROR_MODEL_FOR_WEB.MESSAGE: You can only compare a maximum of 4 plans at a time.

FILTER_TOOLTIPS.CLIAM_FEATURE: With a single payout feature, you will only be eligible for a one-time payout in the event you are diagnosed with either early, intermediate or late stage critical illness. A multiple payout feature allows for additional payouts to be made to you in the event of a re-diagnosis of early, intermediate or late stage critical illness.
FILTER_TOOLTIPS.DEFERRED_PERIOD: This indicates the length of waiting time between your diagnosis of a disability and the point where the payout occurs.
FILTER_TOOLTIPS.ESCALATING_BENEFIT: This feature gives you a 3% yearly increase in payout to help beat inflation.
FILTER_TOOLTIPS.FULL_PARTIAL_RIDER:
Full Rider:
This rider provides coverage for both co-insurance and deductible components.

Partial Rider:
This rider only provides coverage for either co-insurance or deductible.

CLAIM_CRITERIA.TITLE: Claim Criteria
CLAIM_CRITERIA.DESCRIPTION:
Standard: To be eligible for a payout, you will have to be unable to perform 3 out of 6 Activities of Daily Living (ADLs).

Lenient: To be eligible for a payout, you will have to be unable to perform 2 out of 6 Activities of Daily Living (ADLs).
